title: btcchamp88

content: hey do anyone know a good and free news app (android) for bitcoin and other crypto?

comments.body: You can make use of CoinGecko and Cointelegraph. The apps are available on goggle app

comments.author: Aanuoluwatofunmi
comments.body: Quote from: btcchamp88 on August 17, 2023, 04:21:23 PMhey do anyone know a good and free news app (android) for bitcoin and other crypto?There are many available, you can check from here:Cryptocurrency news and tracking https://coinmarketcap.com/gainers-losers/https://www.tradingview.com/crypto-screener/Others are:CoingeckoCrypto appCointelegraghThere are many websites that gives cryptocurrency updates but you have to be very mindful of the ones to choose because some may not have an upto date information and analysis on cryptocurrency, while some may also be carrying fake rumors about bitcoin or other cryptocurrencies around the internet but i think these few were of good reputation.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Quote from: btcchamp88 on August 17, 2023, 04:21:23 PMhey do anyone know a good and free news app (android) for bitcoin and other crypto?https://cryptopanic.com/ is what you are looking for because it is a news aggregator. It collects all the news from the different news outlet. You literally browse all the news published about crypto using this app because it provides real time update.This https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.cryptopanic.android  is the download link on playstore. I'm using this since the last bull run for my day trading. Enjoy!

comments.author: Bananington
comments.body: Quote from: btcchamp88 on August 17, 2023, 04:21:23 PMhey do anyone know a good and free news app (android) for bitcoin and other crypto?Apps specifically made for news about crypto are good, but you do not always have to use and depend on them if you know your way around the internet or even on any social media platform where you can simply follow crypto related feeds. Also just so you know how badly this can affect you if you are not emotionally strong, if you develop the habit of always checking the news about bitcoins and what is happening to it, you will most likely be susceptible to Fear, Uncertainty and Doubt (FUD).

comments.author: notocactus
comments.body: The less news you read, the better but if you like news and want to digest news, let's useBitcoin Discussion (Press)https://www.coindesk.comhttps://decrypt.co/https://bitcoinmagazine.com/https://bitcoinist.com/https://www.marketwatch.com/market-data/cryptocurrencyhttps://cointelegraph.com/https://www.newsbtc.com/https://blockonomi.com/https://cryptolinks.com/cryptocurrency-newsIf you are not experienced enough to filter news to classify them as news for actual events or just FUD, don't read news.

comments.author: BD Crypto
comments.body: Quote from: btcchamp88 on August 17, 2023, 04:21:23 PMhey do anyone know a good and free news app (android) for bitcoin and other crypto?Obviously there are a lot but you have to choose from them according to your needs. Do you want to know about upcoming events of a project? Or you just want to know latest crypto news for being updated? Both of them are necessary because to be a good trader you have to keep eyes on upcoming potential events because then price can move significantly. To know about upcoming events news and latest news the best application will be Coinmarketcal . Here is the application link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.coincalAnyway some good news apps have been shared already and I am just adding some others. I will advise OP to try them and choose the perfect one for him. For latest crypto news related apps you can add these in your list and choose the best one.1. Crypto news 2. Coinstats3. Coinview4. Bitnews 5. Coindex

comments.author: notocactus
comments.body: I have to warn OP with a reminder that self-limit number of applications installed on a device is better.If you install so many applications on your device, it will have more risk of hacks, exploitations as a user, you have no way to verify security of those applications. If one of applications is exploited, your device is infected.You will live with potential nightmare if you store your cryptocurrency on that device or install exchange applications on that device and log in your accounts on it as well.

comments.body: Many members already shared the most used and famous apps but i think instead of opening apps and looking for news on those apps you should joining TG bots too, The platforms above members shared have there own TG bots or channels where they share the same news the plus point will be you would be able to see the NEWS in an ordered way which sometimes comes handy.And also easy to read too because on TG they share Title and summary of the article while on those apps or websites they don't. comments.author: goldkingcoiner
comments.body: Quote from: btcchamp88 on August 17, 2023, 04:21:23 PMhey do anyone know a good and free news app (android) for bitcoin and other crypto?Why would you need an app for cryptocurrency news? Just open your browser and type in coindesk.com or cointelegraph.com. Its all the same news with slightly different headlines. Their websites should be phone friendly, although I honestly have not accessed them through my phone just yet. So I would not know. And in any way you would need an internet connection for either news app or browser. It just seems a bit strange to me. Like microwaving pop-tarts when you have a toaster. Just how many seconds of your time are you trying to save?

comments.author: mvdheuvel1983
comments.body: Quote from: goldkingcoiner on August 17, 2023, 07:10:29 PMWhy would you need an app for cryptocurrency news? Just open your browser and type in coindesk.com or cointelegraph.com. Its all the same news with slightly different headlines. Their websites should be phone friendly, although I honestly have not accessed them through my phone just yet. So I would not know. And in any way you would need an internet connection for either news app or browser. It just seems a bit strange to me. Like microwaving pop-tarts when you have a toaster. Just how many seconds of your time are you trying to save?   Having to open apps on phone just to get bitcoin news is a lot of work. I know it is the OP's preference but he or she needs to consider the amount of stress they have to put up with just to get the crypto news. Also, they have to constantly deal with the ads pop ups that accompanies using those mobile apps which I find really annoying. All the OP need is a chrome browser and whenever they want crypto news just go and search for " Bitcoin news now", or " Crypto news now" or whatever keywords you want then go ahead and filter what you want. It is that simple instead of an app that would occupy your phone space, make you annoyed and leave you vulnerable to hacks and other security threats. Totally not worth it.

comments.author: Texac
comments.body: Quote from: btcchamp88 on August 17, 2023, 04:21:23 PMhey do anyone know a good and free news app (android) for bitcoin and other crypto?Why don't you use social networks like x.com, reddit... where you can update news as quickly as possible instead of following general news websites.  moreover, you should find yourself a few reliable sources to follow, do not follow too much will only waste your time and dilute the information.  I used to struggle like you to find complete and fast sources of market news.  but in the end, I found that by using x.com and Reddit social networks, I could almost get market news pretty fast.

comments.author: Ultegra134
comments.body: Why must you use an application for that? May I recommend the good ol' Google search by simply heading over to the "News" section and searching what you're looking for? In this particular scenario, Bitcoin will simply present you with a handful of the latest articles from many different news websites, all accumulated in one simple search. I don't believe you need anything more than that, and it's much more convenient and versatile than visiting a specific website that may even be biased when I'm looking to read the latest news regarding a specific coin or incident.
